document_data.name: Theymarsh
document_data.mainbody: '''Theymarsh''' was a port town on the [[Lake of Steam]], part of the [[Border Kingdoms]] region of [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Geography: [[File:Lake of Steam 2e.jpg|thumb|''A 14{{th}} century DR map showing the location of Theymarsh in the Border Kingdoms.''|360x360px]] Theymarsh stood on the [[Strait of Storms]], with the town of [[Suldolphor]] across from it. The Strait of Storms connected the Lake of Steam to the north with the [[Shining Sea]] to the south. Theymarsh's closest neighbor to the south was the town of [[Yallasch]], connected to Theymarsh by a minor road. The [[Neth Stand]] forest was immediately to the southeast from Theymarsh.
document_data.Trade: Theymarsh was known in the north for its delicate blown and worked glass – notably bird figurines. Other major industries in Theymarsh were logging, mining, and [[fish]]ing.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, a pirate vessel of the first mate [[Kalil yi Tulmon]] of the [[Rundeen]] regularly attacked merchant ships departing ports of [[Almraiven]], [[Suldophor]], and Theymarsh. The attacks were cruel and ruthless, leaving many sailors dismembered.

Inhabitants.Notable Organizations: *[[Fallen Few]], an assassins' guild of the Border Kingdoms, thought destroyed in Theymarsh as of [[1374 DR]].
Inhabitants.Notable Individuals: *[[Ssilban]], an infamous [[thief]] of Theymarsh and an enemy of [[Baelam]] "The Bold", active in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/172/Lone Wolves|100}}
